A4.text: He gained wider appreciation for his role as the elderly Bilbo Baggins in Peter Jackson's The Lord of the Rings (2001-2003) and The Hobbit (2012-2014) film trilogies

A6.text: Freeman played lead character Bilbo Baggins in Peter Jackson's three-part The Hobbit film series
